issue.body:
### Prerequisites

- [X] This site DOES NOT contain sexually explicit material, otherwise use [NSFW-specific form](./new?template=bug_report_NSFW.yml);

- [X] AdGuard product version is up-to-date;
- [X] Browser version is up-to-date;
- [X] If the site or app is broken, disabling AdGuard protection resolves an issue.

### What product do you use?

Other ad blocker

### AdGuard version

None

### What type of problem have you encountered?

Missed ads or ad leftovers

### Which browser(s) do you use?

other (specify in comment below)

### Which device do you use?

Desktop

### Where is the problem encountered?

www.imdb.com

### What filters do you have enabled?

AdGuard Base filter

### What Stealth Mode options do you have enabled?

_No response_

### Add your comment and screenshots

I'm using ublock on waterfox with adguard's list and the ads are blocked in the site but the places where the ads were arent removed.

### Privacy

- [X] I agree to follow this condition

comment.body:
It seems that it's caused by `Web Annoyances Ultralist`, so please disable it or try to add this rule:
```adblock
feedly.com#@$##searchBarFX, .fixed-bar { position: absolute !important; }
```
to user rules.

comment.body:
Unfortunately, I have not been able to reproduce the described behavior of the page. Please make sure that firefox trusts the AdGuard certificate. You can see detailed instructions at: https://adguard.com/kb/adguard-for-android/solving-problems/firefox-certificates/
If the problem persists, please reopen the issue.  I would also appreciate more information about which filter is causing the crash on your device.

to user rules.

>But in this case, perhaps this script is blocked, since it essentially also collects information about the number of people connected to the profile from this page, etc., that is, it collects telemetry.

But maybe I missed something, so could you provide some evidence about tracking?

comment.body: Frames from twitter and facebook yes, as they count as tracking content, and leave behind cookies that can later be associated with your id and serve up ads.But in this case, perhaps this script is blocked, since it essentially also collects information about the number of people connected to the profile from this page, etc., that is, it collects telemetry.
